head.title: Ralph Reed Is His Cross to Bear

hedline.hl1: Ralph Reed Is His Cross to Bear

abstract.p: Lawrence Russ letter says photo of Randy Tate accompanying Aug 9 Melinda Henneberger article made Tate look unecessarily demonic

block.p: You must have pulled out a textbook on prejudicial photo-editing in Melinda Henneberger's article on Randy Tate (''Ralph Reed Is His Cross to Bear,'' Aug. 9). You managed to take the new leader of the Christian Coalition, a man whom the article reveals to be thoroughly mild-mannered, and create a full-page portrait that makes him look like (of all things) the Devil incarnate. The extreme close-up view and the dark, high-contrast printing magnify every pore on his face. Ah, the preternatural menace of it all.
